com.noelios.restlet.component
Class RestletContainerImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.noelios.restlet.component.OriginServerImpl
      com.noelios.restlet.component.RestletContainerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, OriginServer, RestletContainer, Element, Maplet, Restlet, UniformInterface
public class RestletContainerImpl
extends OriginServerImpl
implements RestletContainer

Component acting as a container for call handlers named restlets. Calls are first intercepted by the container which can do various checks before effectively delegating it to one of the registered root maplets or restlets.

          Delegate maplet handling root restlets.

Method Detail

createMapletDelegate

public Maplet createMapletDelegate()
Returns a new maplet acting as a delegate for maplets. Developers who need to extend the default maplets should override it.

Specified by:
createMapletDelegate in interface RestletContainer
Returns:
A new maplet.

createRestletCall

public RestletCall createRestletCall(UniformCall call)
Returns a new restlet call wrapping a given uniform call. Developers who need to extend the default restlet calls should override it.

Specified by:

Returns:

Pattern

attach

public void attach(String pathPattern,
                   Class<? extends Restlet> restletClass)
Attaches a restlet class. A new instance will be created for each call.

Specified by:
attach in interface Maplet
Parameters:
pathPattern - The path pattern used to map calls.
restletClass - The restlet class to attach (must have a constructor taking a RestletContainer parameter).
See Also:
Pattern
